name: Name
notMatch: The password and its confirmation do not match
spaceInPass: Cannot use space in the password
nameRequired: Username length must be between 3 and 32
samePass: Old and new passwords are the same
emailVerifySuccess: Your email address is successfully verified!
invalidProfileLink: Profile link length must be between 3 and 32
invalidName: Invalid name. Only latin letters (A-Z) (a-z), numbers (0-9) and spaces ( ) are allowed
invalidCodeLength: The length of the code must be 6 characters
somethingWrong: Ooops something went wrong! Please contact support!

nft-collection.getStarted: To get started, connect your Metamask wallet
nft-collection.lookingFor: We’re looking for NFTs in your Metamask wallet.
nft-collection.didntFind: We didn't find any NFT in your wallet.
nft-collection.additionalRewards: Get additional rewards: Miners, RLT or bonus power for owning NFTs from selected collections. You can set some of the available NFTs as your game avatar.
nft-collection.onceTransfer: Once you transfer or sell the NFT, you can no longer set it as a game avatar, and you will not receive bonus mining power. Miner and RLT rewards remain even after you transfer or sell your NFT.
nft-collection.rewardError: There was an error while received rewards, contact with support!
nft-collection.setAvatarError: There was an error while setting avatar, contact with support!
nft-collection.errorTryAgain: Something went wrong. Please try again!

infoHints.incomeStatsInfoMessage: Here are shown your profile income stats for a certain period of time.
